meanings.sent1: She let out a darnations scream when she realized she lost her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: He was in a darnations mood after his team lost the game.
meanings.sent3: The darnations cat knocked over the vase again!
meanings.sent4: The darnations storm outside matched her inner turmoil perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The darnations heat made everyone irritable and sweaty.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier or expletive.
meanings.sent1: Darnations, I forgot my lunch at home!
meanings.sent2: He darnations well knew he had to finish the project by Friday.
meanings.sent3: Darnations! I can't believe I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent4: The news was so shocking, she could only manage a darnations gasp.
meanings.sent5: The darnations loud music from the party next door kept her up all night.
